ygData.subject: Re: More Charismat Carrilon data
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I tried it on a Nektulos Guard (Dark Elf lands) and changed him from scowls and ready to attack to looks at me threateningly ... he still chased me out
ygData.messageBody:
> Last night I did a little experimenting with the level 11 song.
>
> Changes have definately occurred.
>
> Here is what I have noticed:
>
> - Singing the song at an NPC who is less than "amiable" to you will
> make them
> look upon you amiably.
>
> - Singing the song at an NPC who "scowls at you ready to attack"
> doesn't seem to
> do anything.

I tried it on a Nektulos Guard (Dark Elf lands) and changed him from
"scowls and ready to attack" to "looks at me threateningly"... he
still chased me out of their forest as I got a bit too close while
trying to charm him :)

Tigsen
